item.content:encoded:
Cork based, MPSTOR, developer of data storage management products today announced that it has raised â‚¬1.5m in new investment, led by the Bank of Ireland Kernel Capital Fund and Asian Investment firm Winning Tack.

The company today also announced the appointment of Mr. Kevin Haverty as its new CEO with immediate effect. Mr. Haverty was previously CEO of Mentec International Ltd.

MPSTOR is based at the Cork Institute of Technologyâ€™s Rubicon Centre and also has an office in Dublin.
